verses.verse: בְּצֵ֣את <WH3318> be-Tzet went out יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'el When Israel מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> mi-mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit the house יַ֝עֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko, of Jacob מֵעַ֥ם <WH5971> me-'Am from a people לֹעֵֽז׃ <WH3937> lo-'Ez. of strange language

הָיְתָ֣ה <WH1961> ha-ye-Tah became יְהוּדָ֣ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah Judah לְקָדְשׁ֑וֹ <WH6944> le-ka-de-Sho; was his sanctuary יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, [and] Israel מַמְשְׁלוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH4475> mam-she-lo-Tav. his dominion

הַיָּ֣ם <WH3220> hai-Yam The sea רָ֭אָה <WH7200> Ra-'ah saw וַיָּנֹ֑ס <WH5127> vai-ya-Nos; [it] and fled הַ֝יַּרְדֵּ֗ן <WH3383> hai-yar-Den, Jordan יִסֹּ֥ב <WH5437> yis-So was driven לְאָחֽוֹר׃ <WH268> le-'a-Chor. back

הֶֽ֭הָרִים <WH2022> He-ha-rim The mountains רָקְד֣וּ <WH7540> ra-ke-Du skipped כְאֵילִ֑ים <WH352> che-'ei-Lim; like rams גְּ֝בָע֗וֹת <WH1389> ge-va-'ot, [and] the little hills כִּבְנֵי־ <WH1121> kiv-nei- afflicted צֹֽאן׃ <WH6629> Tzon. cattle

מַה־ <WH4100> mah- What לְּךָ֣ le-Cha הַ֭יָּם <WH3220> Hai-yom What [ailed] thee O thou sea כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for תָנ֑וּס <WH5127> ta-Nus; that thou fleddest הַ֝יַּרְדֵּ֗ן <WH3383> hai-yar-Den, ;thou Jordan תִּסֹּ֥ב <WH5437> tis-So [that] thou wast driven לְאָחֽוֹר׃ <WH268> le-'a-Chor. O

הֶֽ֭הָרִים <WH2022> He-ha-rim Ye mountains תִּרְקְד֣וּ <WH7540> tir-ke-Du [that] ye skipped כְאֵילִ֑ים <WH352> che-'ei-Lim; like rams גְּ֝בָע֗וֹת <WH1389> ge-va-'ot, [and] ye little hills כִּבְנֵי־ <WH1121> kiv-nei- afflicted צֹֽאן׃ <WH6629> Tzon. cattle

מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> mil-lif-Nei at the presence אָ֭דוֹן <WH113> 'A-don of the Lord ח֣וּלִי <WH2342> Chu-li Tremble אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> 'A-retz; thou earth מִ֝לִּפְנֵ֗י <WH6440> mil-lif-Nei, at the presence אֱל֣וֹהַּ <WH433> e-Lo-ah of the God יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko. of Jacob

הַהֹפְכִ֣י <WH2015> ha-ho-fe-Chi Which turned הַצּ֣וּר <WH6697> hatz-Tzur the rock אֲגַם־ <WH98> 'a-gam- [into] a standing מָ֑יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim; water חַ֝לָּמִ֗ישׁ <WH2496> chal-la-Mish, the flint לְמַעְיְנוֹ־ <WH4599> le-ma'-ye-nov- into a fountain מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> Ma-yim. of waters
